name: The best DEX-based WM build? Best as in insanely high AB and AC...
author: Cornflower

posts.author: Cornflower
posts.content:
Sorry to disappoint, but I don't have a suggestion, it's just a question. I heard somewhere that F11, R13, WM16 would yeild the best DEX-fighter. It's not intuitive, actually I would suggest a pure Fighter8, WM32 would max out your AB. Add some monk and you'll change some AB for AC, but still. Also heard something about Ranger 10, WM30, but that can't be right?

So, I guess the build I'm looking for is somewhere in the lvl 40 section, but which? There are so many.... Can I humbly ask for some guidance?

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
I'd suggest Max's Drow Fencer (Fighter 14/ Rogue 19/ WM 7) - with a straight AB of 47 and a naked AC of 33.

Worth a look, at least.

Cheers

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
You take 3 or 4 Rogue levels, 10 WM levels and 6 or 7 Fighter levels pre epic.
If you max out dexterity (at the cost of Constitution), halfling can reach AB 51 and AC 36, human AB 49 and AC 35. Both get ED. If you give Halfling IKD, there will not be room for Blind Fight. The builds will benefit from not min/maxing too heavily.

There are two builds posted with that class combo in the old archives. One is str based, The dex build is a dual wielding halfling.
I have some builds that I can look at, and maybe post something here.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
Blind Fight is missing, putting you at a disadvantage against concealed enemies.  Also, I would go for sword-and-board for the AC, and for not having the -4 AB from dual-wielding medium weapons.  Replace those dual-wielding feats with Blind Fight, Improved Knockdown, and Toughness.  While you are shuffling things around, take Weapon Spec much earlier.  If you take all 10 levels of Fighter before you start WM, you can get Blind Fight, WS, and Knockdown before WM starts, and then Improved Crit at 12, Improved Knockdown at 15, and Toughness at 18.  Also, I would take Weapon Focus at level 1.

In epic levels, I would take all the same things, but in a different order.  I would take EWF at 24, then Fighter 11 and 12 at 25 and 26 so I can take EWS at 26, then Armor Skin at 29, Epic Prowess at 32, and Improved Whirlwind at 35, and no other changes.
